alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Niagara; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:23AM EST until February 23 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of up to three tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph near the Lake Ontario shoreline. * WHERE...Niagara, Orleans, and Monroe counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 6 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice and gusty winds. Travel could be extremely difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes.
info.instruction: Periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will result in slippery roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow and ice reports through our website or social media.
